title: IPM Multisport Pavilion
text: The IPM Multisport Pavilion is part of the <a href="Macao%20Polytechnic%20Institute">Macao Polytechnic Institute</a> (IPM) in <a href="Macau">Macau</a>, <a href="People%27s%20Republic%20of%20China">People's Republic of China</a>. It covers a total area of over and has a seating capacity of 3,800. This modern Pavilion is ideal for indoor sports such as <a href="basketball">basketball</a>, assorted <a href="ball%20games">ball games</a>, <a href="volleyball">volleyball</a>, etc. It is connected to the adjacent <a href="Macau%20Forum">Macau Forum</a> via a footbridge and a short underground passage.
